short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bettermark keeps track of your browsing history, so you can find that site where you read that really interesting post two weeks ago

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bettermark tracks your browsing history, automatically organizing the sites you visit into a daily stream, topics and more. It also provides full search functionality, so you never lose track of that website you visited before!
